binksi -- 0.13.1 (2024/06/10)

about

binksi is a bitsy-like tool for making small lo-fi graphical adventure games where a character explores a world and interacts with its inhabitants.

propulse your bipsi games with narration engine ink.

many thanks and kudos to candle creator of bipsi ! Support its development on candle's patreon.
